original_title: Sesame Street: Elmo and Friends: Tales of Adventure
overview: Elmo and Friends: Tales of Adventure is a DVD from Genius Entertainment released exclusively to Target for a limited time in 2008, and later in a wider release in 2009. The packaging and menus are designed with an Indiana Jones theme, and features Elmo dressed as the adventurer.
title: Sesame Street: Elmo and Friends: Tales of Adventure
